title: The Fabricant x Shavonne Wong Cover
description:
This September, all 28 editions of Vogue unite under the global theme of ‘New Beginnings’ as a hopeful statement towards a new dawn. For Vogue Singapore, to consider new beginnings is to explore the intersection of fashion and technology and the rise of NFTs as a new marketplace for digital designers and creators.

As such, we are proud to present one of two virtual-only covers: 'The RenaiXance Rising' by digital fashion house The Fabricant in collaboration with Singapore artist Shavonne Wong. This programmable NFT changes in posture and lighting according to the live time in Singapore.

Welcome to our historic NFT issue. Welcome to a new dawn.

title: Chad Knight x Baëlf Design Covergi
description:
For the September issue of Vogue Singapore, you would have noticed a large QR code on our print cover. However, we don’t actually have a print cover at all. Rather, it serves as a portal to the two digital-only covers that we've created in collaboration with local and international digital artists—the protagonists driving the new creative renaissance born out of NFTs.

Here, we are proud to present one of the two virtual-only covers: 'Triumphant Awakening' by 3D artist Chad Knight in collaboration with Singapore design studio Baëlf Design, who created the AI-generated fractal headpiece. This cover artwork can also be purchased as a one-of-one NFT.

Welcome to our historic NFT issue. Welcome to a new dawn.
